data.eml:eml: Clarifying the taxonomic status and distributions of the spider species collected during the Leonhard Schultze expeditions in western and central southern Africa (Arachnida: Araneae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Haddad, Charles R., Marusik, Yuri M. (2019): Clarifying the taxonomic status and distributions of the spider species collected during the Leonhard Schultze expeditions in western and central southern Africa (Arachnida: Araneae). Zootaxa 4608 (3): 451-483, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4608.3.3
